titleStmt.title: The prologue and epilogue to the new comedy, called, The English Fryer, or, The town sparks. Licensed, March 17. 1689. J.F.
titleStmt.author: Crown, Mr. (John), 1640?-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Am[o]ry; and published by Randal Taylor,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Heaven to the Muses well may coyn deny;".
With an advertisement at the bottom of p.2.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
